alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 16 at 4:02AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Oklahoma and western Oklahoma, including the following counties, in southwest Oklahoma, Kiowa. In western Oklahoma, Beckham, Custer, Roger Mills and Washita. * WHEN...Until 700 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 402 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elk City, Cordell, Cheyenne, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Dill City, Canute, Rocky and Berlin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita
